ygData.subject: Re: Intensify Death
ygData.msgSnippet: Well if your not a Dark Elf Necro then I would also pick up Shadow Sight. Also if your planning on going to perma in the future I would get resist cold to help
ygData.messageBody:
Well if your not a Dark Elf Necro then I would also pick up Shadow Sight.
Also if your planning on going to perma in the future I would get resist
cold to help you out there. Other then that the rest of the spells are
useless. Definitly get Poison Shock it does 169 in dd and actually makes
Necros good at dd for awhile.

Naeeldar Dark Elf Necromancer of the 37th Circle

-----Original Message-----
From: wolfie <lachdanan@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, September 11, 1999 8:08 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Intensify Death


>From: wolfie <lachdanan@...>
>
>
>Poison Shock and research or buy (Grobb SK guild) pet spell only real
>useful ones. Charm does not exist as L24 spell, but you can buy Screaming
>terror. Buy the shield spells, Greater Shielding and Leatherskinn. The
>latter ads 200 hp protection until used but cost a bloodstone per use (like
>6gold ea). rest are useless.
>
>At 01:42 PM 9/10/99 -0700, you wrote:
>>From: Fitzroy <fitzroy69@...>
>>
>>Damn I am about to be 23rd and I am really looking forward to 24th, what
do
>>you folks reccomend
>>for spells at that level, Also I don't really know what equipment i should
>>be using. I am the only
>>necromancer I know.
>>
>>
>>Belsarius
>>Tarew Marr
>>
>>--- Naeeldar <jackal@...> wrote:
>>> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>>>

>>> Naeeldar

how

hands
>>> >and feet. At the time I was L28, and the pet spell was L24, and the max
